name: Colin R. Singer with Zombie boy

desc.html: Colin's images of Zombie Boy were exhibited in the May 2014 exhibit in the Museum du Quai Branly in Paris in the Exhibition "Tattoer Tattooed" as well as its special edition catalog and the January 2012 exhibit in the Paris based Gallery des Curieux.

wiki.Credit:
As an avid photographer, Colin R. Singer promoted and frequently photographed Zombie Boy through a distinctive artistic expression of body modification captured through high fashion imagery.
Previously published: colinsinger.ca
wiki.Artist: Colin Singer
